Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Alipha.Lama.Ra., Iha a'itam hana ika kitaba ate sapasata kura'ana di'am
Uha samam avega jadom inakari loka kamana karanage ki kasa! Uha vi manana vale hude
Inham nu chado ki khana ate labha utha'una ate phauki umida inham nu bhulekhe vica pa'i rakhe. Tam jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Ate asim jisa basati nu vi barabada kita, usa da ki niyata samam likhi'a ho'i'a si
Ko'i kauma apane mithe same te na age vadhadi hai ate na piche hatadi hai
Ate iha loka akhade hana ki he bade! Jisa upara rabi hada'ita da prakasa ho'i'a hai. Besaka tu suda'i haim
(Uha akhade hana ki) jekara tu saca haim tam sade kola farisati'am nu ki'um nahim lai a'unda
Asim farisati'am nu kevala faisali'am la'i hi bhejade ham. Ate usa vele lokam nu mauka nahim dita janda
Iha kura'ana asim hi utari'a hai. Ate asim hi isa de nigarana ham
Ate asim tuhade tom pahilam ho cuki'am kaumam vica rasula bheja cuke ham
Ate jihara rasula vi unham de kola a'i'a uha usa da makhaula uda'unde rahe
Isa taram asim iha (makhaula) aparadhi'am de manam vica pa dide ham
Uha isa upara imana nahim li'a'unage, te iha tarika pahilam de lokam de same tom hi cali'a a riha hai
Ate jekara asim unham la'i asamana da ko'i daravaza khol'ha dide jisa upara uha carhana lagade
Usa same vi uha kahi dide ki sadi'am akham nu dhokha ho riha hai. Sagom sade upara ko'i jadu kara dita gi'a hai
Ate asim akasam vica buraja (tara madala) bana'e. Ate vekhana vali'am la'i usa nu sigari'a vi
Ate usa nu hara ika dhirakare ho'e saitana tom surakhi'ata vi kita
Jekara ko'i cori chipe sunana la'i kana vi laga'unda tam ika camakada ho'i'a agara usa da picha karada
Ate asim dharati nu caura kita te isa upara asim pahara rakha dite. Usa vica hara ika ciza gine mithe dhaga nala paida kiti ga'i
Ate asim tuhade la'i isa adara rizaka de sadhana bana'e. Ate uha jiva jatu paida kite jinham nu tusim rozi (bhojana) nahim dide
Ate ko'i ciza ajihi nahim jisade khazane sade pasa na hona ate asim usa nu ika niradharita paimane de nala utarade hana

Ate asim hi havavam nu bhari (varakha karana vale) banake cala'unde ham. Phira asi asamana tom pani varasa'unde ham ate phira usa pani nala tuhanu sijade ham. Ate iha tuhade vasa di gala nahim si ki tusim isa da bhadara ikatha kara sakade
Ate besaka asim hi jivata karade ham ate asim hi marade ham. Ate asim hi baki rahange
Ate asim tuhade vaderi'am nu vi janade ham ate tuhade pichom a'una vale lokam nu vi
Ate besaka tuhada raba unham sari'am nu ikatha karega. Uha sarava-gi'ata ate tataveta hai
Ate asim' hi manukha nu gare di kharakadi miti tom paida kita hai
Ate isa tom pahilam asim jinam nu aga di'am lapatam tom paida kita
Ate jadom tere raba ne farisati'am nu kiha ki maim' gunhe ho'e gare di suki miti tom ika manukha paida karana vala ham
Jadom maim usa nu pura bana lavam ate usa vica apani ruha phuka devam tam tusim usa nu sijada karana la'i jhuka jana
Tam sare farisati'am ne sijada kita
Paratu ibalisa ne sijada karana vali'am da satha dena tom manha kara dita
Alaha ne kiha he ibalisa! Tainu ki ho'i'a ki tu sijada karana vali'am vica samila nahim ho'i'a
Ibalisa ne kiha, ki maim ajiha nahim ki manutha nu sijada karam, jisa nu tu gunhe ho'e gare di suki miti tom paida kita hai
Alaha ne kiha tu ithom nikala ja, ki'unki tu dhirakari'a ho'i'a hai
Ate ko'i saka nahim' tainu phaisale de dina taka dhirakara hai
Ibalisa ne kiha, he mere palanahara! Tu mainu usa dina taka la'i mauka de jisa dina loka mura jivita kite janage
Alaha ne kiha tainu mauka dita gi'a
Usa niyata kite ho'e samem taka
Ibalisa ne kiha, he mere palanahara! Jivem tu sainu bhataka'i'a hai. Ise taram maim inham la'i dharati nu sigaranga ate sari'am nu puthe rahim toranga
Bina tere cune ho'e badi'am de
Alaha ne farama'i'a, iha ika sidha raha hai, jihara mura mere taka pahucada hai
Besaka jihare mere bade hana, unham upara tera vasa nahim' calega. Thinam unham de jihare bhatake ho'e teri palana karana
Ate unham sari'am la'i naraka da va'ada hai
Usa de sata daravaze hana. Hara ika daravaze la'i unham lokam de vakha vakha hise hana
Besaka darana vale, bagam ate casami'am vica honage
Vakhila ho javem inham vica surakhi'ata ate santi de nala
Ate asim unham de dilam vicom davaisa kadha devange. Sare asanam upara ahamane sahamane bharavam di taram rahinage
Ute unham nu ko'i dukha nahim pahucavega ate na hi uha kadhe janage
Mere badi'am nu khabara de devo ki maim mu'afa karana vala ate rahimata karana vala ha
